verses.verse: Having Laid Aside <S%G659><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Malice <S%G2549><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Guile <S%G1388><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Hypocrisies <S%G5272><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Envyings <S%G5355><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Evil Speakings, <S%G2636><s%>

As <S%G5613><s%> Newborn <S%G738><s%> Babes, <S%G1025><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Mental <S%G3050><s%> Genuine <S%G97><s%> Milk <S%G1051><s%> Long Ye After, <S%G1971><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> By <S%G1722><s%> It <S%G846><s%> Ye May Grow, <S%G837><s%>
If Indeed <S%G1512><s%> Ye Did Taste <S%G1089><s%> That Is <S%G3754><s%> Good <S%G5543><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

To <S%G4314><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> Coming, <S%G4334><s%> A Stone <S%G3037><s%> Living, <S%G2198><s%> By <S%G5259><s%> Men <S%G444><s%> Indeed <S%G3303><s%> Rejected, <S%G593><s%> <S%G3844><s%> But With <S%G1161><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Chosen, <S%G1588><s%> Precious, <S%G1784><s%>

Also <S%G2532><s%> Yourselves, <S%G846><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Stones <S%G3037><s%> Living, <S%G2198><s%> Are Being Built Up, <S%G3618><s%> A House <S%G3624><s%> Spiritual, <S%G4152><s%> A Priesthood <S%G2406><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> To Offer <S%G399><s%> Spiritual <S%G4152><s%> Sacrifices <S%G2378><s%> Acceptable <S%G2144><s%> To <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> By <S%G1223><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> It Is Contained <S%G4023><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Scripture : <S%G1124><s%>, Behold, <S%G2400><s%> I Place <S%G5087><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Sion <S%G4622><s%> A Stone <S%G3037><s%> Corner, <S%G204><s%> Chosen, <S%G1588><s%> Precious : <S%G1784><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He That <S%G3588><s%> Believes <S%G4100><s%> ' On <S%G1909><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3756><s%> In No Wise <S%G3361><s%> Should Be Put To Shame. <S%G2617><s%>

To You <S%G5213><s%> Therefore Is <S%G3767><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Preciousness <S%G5092><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Believe; <S%G4100><s%> To Those Disobeying <S%G544><s%> But, The <S%G1161><s%> Stone <S%G3037><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Rejected <S%G593><s%> Those <S%G3588><s%> Building, <S%G3618><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> <S%G1096><s%> Became <S%G1519><s%> Head <S%G2776><s%> Of The Corner, <S%G1137><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> A Stone <S%G3037><s%> Of Stumbling <S%G4348><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> A Rock <S%G4073><s%> Of Offence; <S%G4625><s%> Who <S%G3739><s%> Stumble At <S%G4350><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Word, <S%G3056><s%> Being Disobedient, <S%G544><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> They Were Appointed. <S%G5087><s%>

<S%G5210><s%> But Ye <S%G1161><s%> Are A Race <S%G1085><s%> Chosen, <S%G1588><s%> A Kingly <S%G934><s%> Priesthood, <S%G2406><s%> A Nation <S%G1484><s%> Holy, <S%G40><s%> A People <S%G2992><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> A Possession, <S%G4047><s%> That <S%G3704><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Virtues <S%G703><s%> Ye Might Set Forth <S%G1804><s%> Of Him Who <S%G3588><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> Darkness <S%G4655><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> Called <S%G2564><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2298><s%> His Wonderful <S%G846><s%> Light; <S%G5457><s%>

Who <S%G3588><s%> Once <S%G4218><s%> Were Not <S%G3756><s%> A People, <S%G2992><s%> <S%G3568><s%> But Now Are <S%G1161><s%> People <S%G2992><s%> God's; <S%G2316><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Had Not Received Mercy, <S%G1653><s%> <S%G3568><s%> But Now <S%G1161><s%> Received Mercy <S%G1653><s%>

Beloved, <S%G27><s%> I Exhort You <S%G3870><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Strangers <S%G3941><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Sojourners, <S%G3927><s%> To Abstain <S%G567><s%> From <S%G3588><s%> Fleshly <S%G4559><s%> Desires, <S%G1939><s%> Which <S%G3748><s%> War <S%G4754><s%> Against <S%G2596><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Soul; <S%G5590><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> <S%G391><s%> Your Manner Of Life <S%G5216><s%> Among <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Nations <S%G1484><s%> Having <S%G2192><s%> Right <S%G2570><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> <S%G1722><s%> Wherein <S%G3739><s%> They Speak Against <S%G2635><s%> You <S%G5216><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Evil Doers, <S%G2555><s%> Through Your <S%G1537><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Good <S%G2570><s%> Works <S%G2041><s%> Having Witnessed <S%G2029><s%> They May Glorify <S%G1392><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Day <S%G2250><s%> Of Visitation. <S%G1984><s%>

Be In Subjection <S%G5293><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> To Every <S%G3956><s%> Human <S%G442><s%> Institution <S%G2937><s%> For The Sake Of <S%G1223><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord; <S%G2962><s%> Whether <S%G1535><s%> To The King <S%G935><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Supreme, <S%G5242><s%>

Or <S%G1535><s%> To Governors <S%G2232><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> ' By <S%G1223><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Sent, <S%G3992><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> <S%G1557><s%> Vengeance On <S%G3303><s%> Evil Doers, <S%G2555><s%> <S%G1868><s%> And Praise To <S%G1161><s%> Well Doers; <S%G17><s%>

Because <S%G3754><s%> So <S%G3779><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Will <S%G2307><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God, By <S%G2316><s%> Well Doing <S%G15><s%> To Put To Silence <S%G5392><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Senseless <S%G878><s%> Men <S%G444><s%> Ignorance; <S%G56><s%>

As <S%G5613><s%> Free, <S%G1658><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> A Cloak <S%G1942><s%> Having <S%G2192><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Malice <S%G2549><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Freedom, <S%G1657><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Bondmen <S%G1401><s%> Of God. <S%G2316><s%>

All <S%G3956><s%> Shew Honour To, <S%G5091><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Brotherhood <S%G81><s%> Love, <S%G25><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Fear, <S%G5399><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> King <S%G935><s%> Honour. <S%G5091><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> Servants, <S%G3610><s%> Being Subject <S%G5293><s%> With <S%G1722><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Fear <S%G5401><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Your Masters, <S%G1203><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Only <S%G3440><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Good <S%G18><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Gentle, <S%G1933><s%> But <S%G235><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Crooked. <S%G4646><s%>

<S%G5124><s%> For This <S%G1063><s%> Is Acceptable <S%G5485><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> For Sake Of <S%G1223><s%> Conscience <S%G4893><s%> Towards God <S%G2316><s%> Endures <S%G5297><s%> Anyone <S%G5100><s%> Griefs, <S%G3077><s%> Suffering <S%G3958><s%> Unjustly. <S%G95><s%>

<S%G4169><s%> For What <S%G1063><s%> Glory Is It, <S%G2811><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Sinning <S%G264><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Being Buffeted <S%G2852><s%> Ye Endure It? <S%G5278><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Doing Good <S%G15><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Suffering <S%G3958><s%> Ye Endure It, <S%G5278><s%> This Is <S%G5124><s%> Acceptable <S%G5485><s%> With <S%G3844><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>

<S%G1519><s%> <S%G5124><s%> For To This <S%G1063><s%> Ye Were Called; <S%G2564><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> Suffered <S%G3958><s%> For <S%G5228><s%> Us, <S%G2257><s%> Us <S%G2254><s%> Leaving <S%G5277><s%> A Model <S%G5261><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Ye Should Follow After <S%G1872><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2487><s%> In His Steps; <S%G846><s%>

Who <S%G3739><s%> Sin <S%G266><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Did No, <S%G4160><s%> Neither <S%G3761><s%> Was Found <S%G2147><s%> Guile <S%G1388><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4750><s%> His Mouth; <S%G846><s%>

Who, <S%G3739><s%> Being Railed At, <S%G3058><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Railed Not In Return; When <S%G486><s%> Suffering <S%G3958><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Threatened Not; <S%G546><s%> <S%G3860><s%> But Gave Himself Over <S%G1161><s%> To Him Who <S%G3588><s%> Judges <S%G2919><s%> Righteously; <S%G1346><s%>

Who <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G266><s%> Our Sins <S%G2257><s%> Himself <S%G846><s%> Bore <S%G399><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4983><s%> His Body <S%G846><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Tree, <S%G3586><s%> That, <S%G2443><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Sins We <S%G266><s%> Being Dead, <S%G581><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Righteousness <S%G1343><s%> We May Live; <S%G2198><s%> <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3468><s%> By Whose Bruise <S%G846><s%> Ye Were Healed. <S%G2390><s%>

<S%G2258><s%> For Ye Were <S%G1063><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Sheep <S%G4263><s%> Going Astray, <S%G4105><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> Are Returned <S%G1994><s%> Now <S%G3568><s%> To <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Shepherd <S%G4166><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Overseer <S%G1985><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5590><s%> Of Your Souls. <S%G5216><s%>
